issue.title: [CF 155] Scrollable dropdown menus
issue.body:
Having a "Losecontrol" setup with 2 meta icons for player, party1-4 and target with 4 subicons for each meta to prioritize what they show, the dropdown menus becomes quite huge and hard to navigate. I'm also at the limit of icons I can reach at the top. It would be awesome for the dropdown menu of available icons for the meta icon to have a definite height and to be scrollable. Thanks for a great addon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Catok | Imported from CurseForge issue #155 | Raw

comments.body:
The dropdown menus are made with blizzards dropdown menu "library", so scrollbars won't be possible. I'll divide the icons into submenus per group instead.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thank you, that did the trick as well.


> Posted by CurseForge user Catok
